effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to activate Luck of the Draw! causing you to cast Guardian of Ancient Kings for 4.0 sec. Your damage done is increased by 15% for 10 sec after Luck of the Draw! activates.
Set: While you have  Luck of the Draw! Shield of the Righteous refunds 1-3 Holy Power and extends the duration of  Luck of the Draw! by 0.5 sec, up to 10 sec.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Use: Fashion nearby garbage into a sphere and launch it into the sky. After 3 sec of gathering momentum the sphere crashes into the targeted location dealing 1.9 million Physical damage split between all enemies in the area. (2 Min Cooldown)
Equip: Add an energy core to the container for every enemy slain, up to a maximum of 20.

Use: Consume all stored energy cores to send a surge of restorative energy through you, instantly healing you for 1.5 million, with an additional 67,844 healing over 10 seconds for each core consumed.  (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

description: Give the Niffen a reason to call you smelly.
